orderable.title: Orderable
orderable.description: Indicates which orderable this physical inventory line item is for.

lot.title: Lot
lot.description: Indicates which lot this physical inventory line item is for.

stockOnHand.description: Indicates previous stock on hand for an orderable.

quantity.description: Indicates current stock on hand for an orderable.

extraData.description: Can be used to save additional data for line item.
extraData.title: extraData
